net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui

Class MassModifyToolController

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.gui.MassModifyToolController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StageController

    public class MassModifyToolController
extends java.lang.Object
implements StageController
    Controller for a tool that allows the user to modify the Grid of drivers and their property in mass way.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Initialize method initializes all the visual elements before they are displayed by the user. initialize method is called automatically by JavaFX when this editor is being loaded from XML.

      • setStage

        public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Lightweight mutator method.
        Specified by:
        setStage in interface StageController
        Parameters:
        stage - Stage on which this controller is going to be displayed.

      • cancelAction

        private void cancelAction()
        Performed by the cancelButton. Closes the current stage.

      • modifyAction

        private void modifyAction()
        Performed by the modifyButton. Passes the modifier settings to the GridModifier with the action based on the user's selection.

      • initTooltips

        private void initTooltips()
        Initializes all tooltips for the control elements
